item.description: After we meet and eat at Chipotle's at 6pm we'll head behind the mall to Regal Cinemas and be in the lobby at 7pm. The film starts at 7:10pm. We'll save some seats and I'll wait in the lobby right until 7:10. Â Hopefully we can find a place to talk about the film for a few minutes afterward. I still remember May 1st....
item.how_to_find_us: I have strawberry blonde hair that I'm just growing out again

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: SHORT NOTICE: Burrito and Zero Dark Thirty in Newington 2/5!
